act_info.full_title: Accidental Fires Act, R.S.O. 1990, c. A.4
act_info.citation: Accidental Fires Act, R.S.O. 1990, c. A.4

content.section: No action for damages from accidental fire
content.content: 1. No action shall be brought against any person in whose house or building or on whose land any fire accidentally begins, nor shall any recompense be made by that person for any damage suffered thereby; but no agreement between a landlord and tenant is defeated or made void by this Act. R.S.O. 1990, c. A.4, s. 1. ______________ Français
content.raw_html:
1. No action shall be brought against any person in whose house or building or on whose land any fire accidentally begins, nor shall any recompense be made by that person for any damage suffered thereby; but no agreement between a landlord and tenant is defeated or made void by this Act. R.S.O. 1990, c. A.4, s. 1.

______________
